description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform any part of their body or worn clothing into propellers capable of rotation at high speed, making them a Rotation Human.

abilities.description: The user can transform body parts into spinning propellers for various purposes including flight.
limitations: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Seastone

abilities.description: By spinning propellers on their body, the user can achieve sustained flight and carry passengers.
limitations: Requires continuous spinning to maintain altitude

abilities.description: Rapid spinning creates powerful gusts of wind that can disperse gas, debris, and other materials.
limitations: Effectiveness depends on spin speed and duration

keyMoments.title: Guru Guru no Mi First Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Buffalo demonstrates his Devil Fruit ability by transforming body parts into propellers for flight.
keyMoments.significance: First showcase of the Guru Guru no Mi's abilities in the anime.

keyMoments.title: Wind Dispersal Technique
keyMoments.description: Buffalo spins rapidly to create a massive wind gust that disperses the poisonous H2S gas around Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the practical applications of the Guru Guru no Mi beyond just flight.

weaknesses: Requires spinning motion which can be disrupted
User becomes vulnerable if propellers are damaged or stopped
